text: Ra timro palanakartale spasta adesa gareko cha ki u baheka timi kasaiko puja nagara ra amaâ€“babuko sathama namra vyavahara gardaigara yadi tiniharumadhye e'uta va duvai timro agadi vrd'dha avasthama pugchan bhane tiniharula'i tiraskrta nagarnu nahapka'unu apitu tiniharusamga sam'manapurvaka maryadita dhangale kurakani garnu
